parameters.query: INSERT INTO iana.conversations (user_id, channel, session_id, metadata) VALUES ($1, $2, $3, $4::jsonb) RETURNING conversation_id, user_id, channel, started_at, last_message_at, message_count

SELECT conversation_id, user_id, channel, session_id, started_at, last_message_at, message_count, total_tokens, total_cost_usd, metadata, created_at, updated_at FROM iana.conversations WHERE conversation_id = $1

UPDATE iana.conversations SET metadata = COALESCE($1::jsonb, metadata), session_id = COALESCE($2, session_id), updated_at = NOW() WHERE conversation_id = $3 RETURNING conversation_id, user_id, channel, updated_at
DELETE FROM iana.conversations WHERE conversation_id = $1 RETURNING conversation_id

SELECT conversation_id, user_id, channel, session_id, started_at, last_message_at, message_count, total_tokens, total_cost_usd, metadata, created_at FROM iana.conversations WHERE ($1::text IS NULL OR user_id = $1) AND ($2::text IS NULL OR channel = $2) ORDER BY last_message_at DESC LIMIT $3 OFFSET $4
UPDATE iana.conversations SET metadata = jsonb_set(COALESCE(metadata, '{}'::jsonb), '{status}', '"closed"'::jsonb), updated_at = NOW() WHERE conversation_id = $1 RETURNING conversation_id, updated_at

additionalFields.queryParameters: ={{ ['iana-conversation', $json.action, $json.user_id, $json.channel || 'api', JSON.stringify($json.data || {}), JSON.stringify($json), $json.success !== false, $json.errorCode || null, $json.errorMessage || null, Date.now() - ($json._meta?.startTime || Date.now()), $json._meta?.requestId || null] }}
